milestones.title: Started Programming Journey
milestones.description: Began learning to code with Python and built my first simple applications. This was the start of my passion for software development.

milestones.title: First Open Source Contribution
milestones.description: Made my first contribution to an open-source project on GitHub. Fixed a documentation bug and learned about pull requests and code reviews.

milestones.title: Full Stack Web Development
milestones.description: Expanded my skills to include front-end development with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Built several personal projects to practice full-stack development.

milestones.title: First Professional Job
milestones.description: Landed my first developer role at a startup. Worked on building scalable web applications and learned about agile development methodologies.

milestones.title: Cloud Computing Certification
milestones.description: Earned AWS Solutions Architect certification. Deepened my understanding of cloud services, infrastructure, and deployment strategies.

milestones.title: Led Major Project
milestones.description: Took on leadership role for a critical project. Coordinated a team of 5 developers and successfully delivered the product ahead of schedule.

milestones.title: Started Independent Development
milestones.description: Transitioned to freelance and independent development. Working on diverse projects for clients while building my own products.

milestones.title: Building SaaS Products
milestones.description: Currently focused on building and launching SaaS products. Exploring new technologies and continuously improving my craft.
